assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Psaty serves on the Steering Committee for the Yale Open Data Access Project funded by Johnson & Johnson and on the DSMB of a clinical trial of a device funded by the manufacturer (Zoll LifeCor). The other authors have no conflict of interest.
